title: Mitt Romney: In His Own Words
description: Mitt Romney is an American politician who served as the Governor of Massachusetts from 2003-2007. As a leader in the Republican Party, Romney was a candidate for the 2008 Republican Party presidential nomination. While his 2008 run for president was unsuccessful, Romney is the front-runner for the 2012 nomination.On the campaign trail, Romney has touted his record as a businessman along with his conservative values as the primary reasons he should unseat President Barack Obama in the White House. This collection of quotations and sayings provide insight into the thoughts of Mitt Romney on the critical campaign issues.
author: Mitt Romney
